summary: Deforestation detection using recurrence quantification analysis

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Maximum absolute difference between values of two time points to still consider as similar.

parameters.name: ignore_nodata
parameters.description: Indicates whether no-data values are ignored or not. Ignores them by default. Setting this flag to `false` considers no-data values so that `null` is returned if any value is such a value.

returns.description: RQA TREND metric summarzing the time series of a given spatial pixel
